short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Print Perfect helps you correct and edit your text to make it sound like it was written by a native English speaker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Print Perfect is powered by Open AI and uses semantic correction to make your text sound like it was written by a native English speaker. Simply highlight and right click the text you want to edit. Next, click the "Print Perfect" button and watch your edited text appear in the side panel. It's super easy to use and perfect for emails, website development, e-commerce listings, and so much more!

Updates:
1.1.0: 
- Made the text in the side panel larger.
- Added a survey tab popup for user feedback.
- Tweaked the Open AI prompt to create better answers.
